Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21626 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-21626 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-14, affected by CVE-2024-21626
